languages.text: {n}Кибелла брезгливо поддевает ножом одну из тряпок.{/n} "Лишь слово твое, Домин'{name}, заставит меня облачиться в мерзость. Но после я выскоблю кожу металлической щеткой и омою щелоком".

{n}With a look of revulsion, Kibellah picks up one of the rags with the tip of her blade.{/n} "Nothing but your word, Domin'{name}, can make me don this filth. Once we are done, I will scrape my skin clean with a metal brush and bathe it in caustic lye."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла брезгливо поддевает ножом одну из тряпок.{/n} "Лишь слово твое, Домин'{name}, заставит меня облачиться в мерзость. Но после я выскоблю кожу металлической щеткой и омою щелоком".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah squeamishly picks up one of the rags with the tip of her blade.{/n} "Nothing but your word, Domin'{name}, can make me don this filth. Once we are done, I will scrape my skin clean with a metal brush and bathe it in caustic lye."

{n}Kibellah squeamishly picks up one of the rags with the tip of her blade.{/n} "Nothing but your word, Domin'{name}, can make me don this filth. Once we are done, I will scrape my skin clean with a metal brush and bathe it in caustic lye."

{n}With a look of revulsion, Kibellah picks up one of the rags with the tip of her blade.{/n} "Nothing but your word, Domin'{name}, can make me don this filth. Once we are done, I will scrape my skin clean with a metal brush and bathe it in caustic lye."

{n}With a look of revulsion, Kibellah picks up one of the rags with the tip of her blade.{/n} "Nothing but your word, Domin'{name}, can make me don this filth. Once we are done, I will scrape my skin clean with a metal brush and bathe it in caustic lye."

{n}With a look of revulsion, Kibellah picks up one of the rags with the tip of her blade.{/n} "Nothing but your word, Domin'{name}, can make me don this filth. Once we are done, I will scrape my skin clean with a metal brush and bathe it in caustic lye."

{n}With a look of revulsion, Kibellah picks up one of the rags with the tip of her blade.{/n} "Nothing but your word, Domin'{name}, can make me don this filth. Once we are done, I will scrape my skin clean with a metal brush and bathe it in caustic lye."

languages.text: {n}Con aspecto asqueado, Kibellah levanta uno de los harapos con la punta de su hoja.{/n} «Domin'{name}, solo su palabra puede hacer que vista esta inmundicia. Cuando acabemos aquí, deberé raspar mi piel con un cepillo de metal y bañarla en sosa cáustica».
languages.original_text: {n}With a look of revulsion, Kibellah picks up one of the rags with the tip of her blade.{/n} "Nothing but your word, Domin'{name}, can make me don this filth. Once we are done, I will scrape my skin clean with a metal brush and bathe it in caustic lye."

traits.locale_text: {n}Con aspecto asqueado, Kibellah levanta uno de los harapos con la punta de su hoja.{/n} «Domin'{name}, solo su palabra puede hacer que vista esta inmundicia. Cuando acabemos aquí, deberé raspar mi piel con un cepillo de metal y bañarla en sosa cáustica».

languages.text: {n} 憤怒の表情で、キベラは刃先で布切れを一枚つまんだ。 {/n}「ドミン・{name}、この汚物を私に着せることはできるのは、あなたの言葉だけです。全て終わったあとは、金属製のブラシで肌をきれいにこすり、苛性灰汁を浴びましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}With a look of revulsion, Kibellah picks up one of the rags with the tip of her blade.{/n} "Nothing but your word, Domin'{name}, can make me don this filth. Once we are done, I will scrape my skin clean with a metal brush and bathe it in caustic lye."

traits.locale_text: {n} 憤怒の表情で、キベラは刃先で布切れを一枚つまんだ。 {/n}「ドミン{name}、この汚物を私に着せることはできるのは、あなたの言葉だけです。全て終わったら、金属製のブラシで肌をきれいにこすり、苛性灰汁を浴びます」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈带着厌恶的表情，用匕首的利刃挑起其中一块破布。{/n}“我之所以会穿上这块污秽的破布，完全是出于你的命令，秘者{name}。等这件事情结束之后，我要用金属刷把我的皮肤刮干净，之后将全身浸泡在腐蚀性的碱液里。”
languages.original_text: {n}With a look of revulsion, Kibellah picks up one of the rags with the tip of her blade.{/n} "Nothing but your word, Domin'{name}, can make me don this filth. Once we are done, I will scrape my skin clean with a metal brush and bathe it in caustic lye."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈带着厌恶的表情，用匕首的利刃挑起其中一块破布。{/n}“我之所以会穿上这块污秽的破布，完全是出于你的命令，秘者{name}。等这件事情结束之后，我要用金属刷把我的皮肤刮干净，之后将全身浸泡在腐蚀性的碱液里。”

languages.text: {n}Mit angewidertem Blick hebt Kibellah einen der Lumpen mit ihrer Klingenspitze hoch.{/n} "Nichts außer Eurem Wort, Domin'{name}, bringt mich dazu, diesen Schmutz anzulegen. Wenn wir fertig sind, werde ich meine Haut mit einer Metallbürste schrubben und in ätzender Lauge baden."
languages.original_text: {n}With a look of revulsion, Kibellah picks up one of the rags with the tip of her blade.{/n} "Nothing but your word, Domin'{name}, can make me don this filth. Once we are done, I will scrape my skin clean with a metal brush and bathe it in caustic lye."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit angewidertem Blick hebt Kibellah einen der Lumpen mit ihrer Klingenspitze hoch.{/n} "Nichts außer Eurem Wort, Domin'{name}, bringt mich dazu, diesen Schmutz anzulegen. Wenn wir fertig sind, werde ich meine Haut mit einer Metallbürste schrubben und in ätzender Lauge baden."

languages.text: {n}L'air dégoûté, Kibellah ramasse l'un des oripeaux avec la pointe de sa lame.{/n} « Rien d'autre qu'un ordre de votre part ne saurait me convaincre de revêtir cette cochonnerie, Domin'{name}. Sitôt notre tâche terminée, je m'étrillerai la peau avec une brosse métallique avant de prendre un bon bain de soude caustique. »
languages.original_text: {n}With a look of revulsion, Kibellah picks up one of the rags with the tip of her blade.{/n} "Nothing but your word, Domin'{name}, can make me don this filth. Once we are done, I will scrape my skin clean with a metal brush and bathe it in caustic lye."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'air dégoûté, Kibellah ramasse l'un des oripeaux avec la pointe de sa lame.{/n} « Rien d'autre qu'un ordre de votre part ne saurait me convaincre de revêtir cette cochonnerie, Domin'{name}. Sitôt notre tâche terminée, je m'étrillerai la peau avec une brosse métallique avant de prendre un bon bain de soude caustique. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, tiksinen bir ifade eşliğinde kılıcının ucuyla paçavralardan birini alıyor.{/n} "Emretmeseydin bu iğrenç şeyi hayatta giymezdim Domin'{name}. İşimiz bittiğinde metal fırçayla derimi kazıyıp aşındırıcı bir çözeltide yıkanacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}With a look of revulsion, Kibellah picks up one of the rags with the tip of her blade.{/n} "Nothing but your word, Domin'{name}, can make me don this filth. Once we are done, I will scrape my skin clean with a metal brush and bathe it in caustic lye."
